description:
The Sotheby’s International Realty brand unveils this initial version of SIR Mobile.  Now you have access to search the most unique and extraordinary properties from coast to coast, right at your fingertips. 
The Sotheby’s International Realty app introduces the latest technology to help you research a future home purchase or rental, while connecting you to some of the most lifestyle-rich homes highlighted under the “Featured Homes” section in the main menu including waterfront, mountain, golf, metropolitan and country living…just to name a few.  
SIR Mobile also displays homes for sale in major metropolitan areas with ever-expanding coverage. Search by GPS, address, city or zip code to view property details, pictures, maps and more.
 SIR Mobile features:
-	Save your search or favorite properties to view later
-	Send a property to a friend via text or email
-	Use the “Send to a Friend” feature to forward the app to any cell phone user via text message
-	Select the “Call to See” option to connect with a Sotheby’s International Realty real estate professional who will field any inquiries or schedule a home tour
-	View full-screen, high quality, color property photos
Coming soon in future versions:
•	Ever-expanding coverage of homes for sale including properties outside the United States
•	Bilingual support
•	Enhanced features and services
About the Sotheby’s International Realty brand: 
Since the founding of the Sotheby's auction house in 1744, the Sotheby's name has earned renown as a marketer for many of the world's most valuable and prestigious possessions. The Sotheby's International Realty brand began in 1976, in part to serve clients desiring a complete package of estate disposition services, and soon became known for representing extraordinary real estate throughout the world.
versionNote:
•Redesign of the app
•Additional International search options 
•Improved performance
•Better stability
•Better usability with more user friendly interface
•Added new Contact feature-User can now either call OR email the broker/agent for property information from within the app
•Additional property view options
•Upgraded Save Search/Favorites capability
